content: > **edit 12 03 2020** this pattern was revised and updated to make it more > clear if you are looking for a baby shower gift or waiting for the new family member to arrive this project is for you it s easy cute and works up fast very satisfying lovey security blanket snuggle blanket whatever you call it this toy is great for little ones this baby lovey is a great project for beginners **free written pattern** available on the website contains all informations necessary to make this toy and is written in standard us terms **level ** easy **measurements ** 25 x 25 cm 10 x 10 inches with recommended yarn and 3 mm crochet hook **note ** the size of this amigurumi will change if you choose finer of bulkier yarn the choice of hook size will affect the final size as well
